alert.note: Alert for Clay; East Otter Tail; West Otter Tail; Wilkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 6:58PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Clay, central Otter Tail and northeastern Wilkin Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 658 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Richville to near Dunvilla to near Rustad. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Perham, Barnesville, Pelican Rapids, Lake Lida, Ottertail, Rothsay and Star Lake. This includes Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 16 and 41. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.

area.areaDesc: Clay; East Otter Tail; West Otter Tail; Wilkin
